It is the world’s leading event for natural gas, LNG, hydrogen, climate technologies, and AI. This year’s edition promises to be particularly impactful thanks to the contribution of global energy leaders who will engage in high-level debate on the most pressing energy challenges, seizing emerging opportunities and shaping the future of the sector.Features
